node.title: I'm *going* to [http://braga.yapceurope.org/|YAPC Europe: Braga, Portugal], because
node.author: cog

data.field: I don't know what else to do with my money I like good food I like good desserts I like the idea of three days of Perl They're forcing me to go I like good weather I like cheap beer I want to meet all you guys What do you mean, going? I want to see what happens to those who voted for [http://braga.yapceurope.org/index.cgi?TheFishnetsIncident|fishnets]
